title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours      Ranger Programs Ranger guided tours step off from the Visitor Center at 10:30 am and 1:30 pm to explore the Wesleyan Chapel, where the women's rights movement had its formal beginnings. Join us for these 30 minute programs.M'Clintock Program The M'Clintock House is open Saturday and Sunday from 1:00 pm-4:00 pm from Memorial Day to Labor Day.  Call 315.568.0024 for more information about the schedule of programs.
